title: Apply uploaded profile photo asset to Hero avatar

requirements.summary: Replace the Hero section avatar with the uploaded profile photo by installing it as a static generated asset while keeping the Hero src unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` and is derived from `cropped_circle_image-1.png`.
When the app is loaded, the avatar image in the Hero section displays the new photo (no broken image icon).
The Hero section avatar image `src` remains `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` (no backend dependency for image loading).

file_operations.description: Add the static profile photo asset at this exact path, generated from the uploaded source file `cropped_circle_image-1.png` (export/convert to a square 512x512 JPG as needed) so the app can load it via `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`.

Verify the Hero avatar continues to use `src="/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg"` and make any non-breaking adjustments needed to ensure the image reliably renders (e.g., optional rendering attributes) without changing the src path or introducing backend image loading.
